name: Terror Tycoon
description:
Take the reigns and create your very own house of terror.

The point of the game is to place spooky props to increase the fear of your customers.

After you build up some fear its time to scare the living crap out of them!

By placing a scary prop at the end of a chain of spooky props you begin earning money.

The stronger the scare the more money earned, so save up some money, build some props, and get to scaring!

CONTROLS

Left click on a prop to begin placing

Left click on grid will place selected prop

Left Clicking off of the map will deselect prop

Left clicking and dragging a prop off of the map will sell it for a portion of the original funds

Right click will rotate props 90 degrees

Left click the "Start Wave" button to spawn guests

NOTE: The next wave can not begin unless all current guests have exited the haunted house

Created By: Aaron Burgher and Alex Neal
